message.raw:
Fix tests compilation on Windows


* Link the tests to the library target
  (instead of the raw library name) also on Windows
* Disable -std=c++11 flag if compiling on Visual Studio
* Generate *-targets.cmake file also for the build

    (instead of the raw library name) also on Windows
  • Disable -std=c++11 flag if compiling on Visual Studio
  • Generate *-targets.cmake file also for the build
